parameters.query:
-- Update transaction with new supplier info
UPDATE sales.transactions 
SET notes = CASE 
    WHEN notes IS NULL THEN 'Supplier updated via Notion: {{ $json.supplier_name }}'
    ELSE notes || ' | Supplier updated via Notion: {{ $json.supplier_name }}'
END,
updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
WHERE external_id ILIKE '%{{ $json.clean_order_number }}%'
   OR external_id ILIKE '%{{ $json.order_number }}%';

-- Also update inventory supplier if we can find it
UPDATE products.inventory 
SET supplier = '{{ $json.supplier_name }}',
    notes = CASE 
        WHEN notes IS NULL THEN 'Supplier updated via Notion on {{ $json.updated_at }}'
        ELSE notes || ' | Supplier updated via Notion on {{ $json.updated_at }}'
    END,
    updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
WHERE id IN (
    SELECT t.inventory_id 
    FROM sales.transactions t 
    WHERE t.external_id ILIKE '%{{ $json.clean_order_number }}%'
       OR t.external_id ILIKE '%{{ $json.order_number }}%'
);

-- Log the update for tracking
SELECT 
    t.id as transaction_id,
    t.external_id,
    t.notes,
    i.supplier,
    t.updated_at
FROM sales.transactions t
LEFT JOIN products.inventory i ON t.inventory_id = i.id
WHERE t.external_id ILIKE '%{{ $json.clean_order_number }}%'
   OR t.external_id ILIKE '%{{ $json.order_number }}%'
ORDER BY t.updated_at DESC
LIMIT 5;
